p: Taking into account the fact that antibacterial agents that are considered bactericidal may only exhibit bacteriostatic activity in vitro [ 49] depending on the concentration at which the antibacterial materials were tested, the behavior of the HAp-B sample could be explained by the fact that the major component of the HAp-B samples was hydroxyapatite and the basil EO was poorly adsorbed onto the surface of hydroxyapatite nanoparticles.
